thread.title: Millions Of People Aren’t Getting Enough Of This Vitamin
thread.title_full: Millions Of People Aren’t Getting Enough Of This Vitamin

author: csgobba
title: Millions Of People Aren’t Getting Enough Of This Vitamin
text:
Privacy Policy | About Us 
Delve Deeper Into Your Blood Pressure Readings Nearly 1 in 3 adults in the U.S. have prehypertension, a condition where their blood pressure is elevated from the normal level, but hasn’t yet reached the level to be considered high. That left a lot of guesswork in how these patients should—or shouldn’t be—treated. Now, researchers from Johns Hopkins Medicine have determined that using CT scans, which detect levels of calcium in the arteries, can help figure out which of these patients would benefit from more aggressive blood pressure treatment . Those with higher calcium scores were more likely to be at risk of heart problems. 
Try This Memory Trick Need to remember some key facts and figures? Tell a friend them immediately after you receive the information . Doing so helps you better recall the details, and remember them for longer afterwards, researchers from Baylor University discovered. 
Head to the Dentist Scuba diving any time soon? You might want to head to the dentist first. Scuba diving can make dental problems worse , including teeth or jaw pain, loose crowns, and broken fillings, according to HealthDay . It’s possible that the water pressure can make dental problems more apparent. 
Beware the Superbug Drug-resistant bacteria may be more prevalent than we thought , according to a new study from Harvard. After examining a family of bacteria called carbapenem resistant Enterobacteriaceae (CRE) at four hospitals, the researchers discovered they have many genetic traits that allow them to resist antibiotics, and that those traits are easily transferable among the different bacterial species. The result? CRE is a continually evolving threat—and it may be transmittable asymptomatically from person to person, meaning its spread can be much more insidious.
